meaning_str.bing:
n. 生物；东西；创造物；〈美〉牛马
网络. 造物计划；动物；人

生物；东西；创造物；〈美〉牛马

1.en: Watching me share my own food with my fellow creatures, the villagers became curious, smiled strangely and whispered to one another.
1.cn: 村民看到我的举动以后，都露出好奇的表情及诡异的笑容，并互相窃窃私语。

2.en: His career began when he took over his parents' zoo in Queensland to help breed endangered creatures, such as the Sumatran tiger.
2.cn: 史蒂夫·欧文的职业生涯开始于他接管自己父母位于昆士兰的一家动物园，他在该动物园内一直致力于诸如苏门答腊虎等濒危野生动物的繁育工作。

3.en: Creatures that lack motivation, that find it easy to slip into oblivious rapture, are likely to lead short (if happy) lives.
3.cn: 生物没有动机的很容易滑进不易察觉的极度欢喜中，这有可能导致短暂的生命。

0.en: A whole world and exchange for a statue. Gods are strange creatures.
0.cn: 一尊雕像换来一整个世界，神真是奇怪的生物。

1.en: Oh, you too. Growing of a boy like creatures need their strength.
1.cn: 噢，你也来一片吧，一个男孩样子的生物需要能量。

2.en: Then discover even more marine creatures, at the Lost Chambers Aquarium.
2.cn: 您亦可以在「失落的空间水族馆」探索更多海洋生物。

3.en: At least 99.9% of creatures that have ever lived aren't preserved in the fossil record.
3.cn: 至少99.9%曾经存在过的生物没能成为化石。

4.en: Oh, I'm gonna be queen of the sea one day. I've learned the names of all the sea creatures.
4.cn: 哦，有一天我会成为海中的女王，我学过所有海洋生物的名字。

5.en: And when we eventually ran out of creatures to dominate, we built this beautiful place.
5.cn: 而当我们最终没有新生物能支配的时候，我们建造了这个美丽的地方。

6.en: That fortress lies beyond our borders. Keep our lands clear of those foul creatures, that is your task.
6.cn: 他们的堡垒远在边界之外，避免邪恶生物侵入我们的领土，这才是你的工作。

7.en: Fascinating creatures, phoenixes. They can carry immensely heavy loads. Their tears have healing powers.
7.cn: 凤凰真是迷人的生物。它们载得动比它重的多的东西。而且它们的眼泪可以治病。

8.en: And what's worse, there's a giant Cyclops who guards the outskirts of the city and preys on innocent sea creatures.
8.cn: 还有更坏的，有个独眼巨人守护着通往城市的道路，并且捕捉无辜的海洋生物。

9.en: Australia has a reputation as a land of creatures that bite, sting, and can even rip off your whole arm.
9.cn: 澳洲出名拥有不同种类的陆上生物，有咬人的，有带刺的，有的甚至可以扯下你整条手臂。

10.en: It's a dolphin. It's one of the most peaceful creatures on earth and you're hacking into it like it was The Cove or something.
10.cn: 那是海豚！是世界上最温顺的生物，可你居然砸它 就像《海豚湾》里的暴行！

11.en: At the Wild Life Sydney nature park, say g'day to some of the world's deadliest creatures, as well as some of Australia's most cuddly.
11.cn: 您可以来到悉尼野生动物自然公园，与一些世界濒临绝种生物，以及澳洲最得意的动物打个招呼。

12.en: The anthropic principle states that if we wish to explain why our universe exists the way it does, the answer is that it must have qualities that allow intelligent creatures to arise who are capable of asking the question. As I am doing so eloquently right now.
12.cn: 人择原理指出如果我们想解释为何宇宙是我们看到的这种样子，那会是因为它必须像现在这样演化出能问出这道问题的智慧生物，才会有这个问题的出现，而我现在就正问着这问题呢。

13.en: All creatures great and small, welcome to the Moon Theater!
13.cn: 无论大小，所有的动物们，欢迎来到月伯乐大剧院！

14.en: What if we're the last creatures left alive? We'll have to repopulate the Earth.
14.cn: 如果地球只剩我们 我们要负责制造人口。

15.en: Time undoes even the mightiest of creatures. Just look at what it's done to you.
15.cn: 连最强大的物种也敌不过时间，看看岁月对你做了什么啊。

16.en: We have a problem? We have some unscheduled activity. Evidently, one of your creatures is restless.
16.cn: 出问题了吗？我们监测到某种非既定活动，显然，你的一个作品不太安分。

17.en: That sounds awful. Oh, it was. I came to realize some creatures are born to get all the love. The rest of us get nothing.
17.cn: 听起来好糟糕。噢，确实。然后我意识到，有些人不废吹灰之力就受人喜爱，我们这些人却什么都得不到！

18.en: But dancing dragons are not the only creatures that play a part in New Year celebrations. There are lions that dance, too.
18.cn: 但新年庆典中，舞动的龙并不是唯一的动物，还有舞狮。

19.en: As king, you need to understand that balance and respect all the creatures, from the crawling ant to the leaping antelope.
19.cn: 身为国王，你不但要了解，还要去尊重所有的生活，包括爬行的蚂蚁和跳跃的羚羊。
